content: --प्रज्ञः (षट्प्रज्ञः) {1} one who is well acquainted with six subjects; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the four {%Puruṣārthas%} or objects of human existence, the nature of the world, and the nature of the Supreme Spirit; धर्मार्यकाममोक्षेषु लोकतत्त्वार्थयोरपि . षट्सु प्रज्ञा तु यस्यासौ षट्प्रज्ञः परिकीर्तितः ... {2} a lustful or licentious man.
